welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.emphasis: Web Development and Design with Acessibility.
welcome.text: Solving problems with tech and criativity, for everyone, everywhere.

about-me.title: About me
about-me.text: A fullstack developer living and enjoying Natal, Brazil. Experienced in creating inclusive and accessible digital experiences and systems. Currently on the later stage of the I.T. Bachelor in the Federal University of Rio Grande do Norte (UFRN).

experiences.title: Experience
experiences.text: My road as a Software Developer is shown here, from the most recent work to the older one.

sti.title: I.T. Superintendence of UFRN - STI/UFRN
sti.description: Creation and maintance on institutional and academic accessible projects as the SIA, FELCS and ENADE projects at Projects Section.

navi.title: Tech Inovation Advanced Nucleum of IFRN - NAVI/IFRN
navi.description: Prototipation and development of Embedded and Web health-related projects. Critical and Urgent Projects development in the pandemic context.

csa.title: Applied Solutions Centre - CSA/IFRN
csa.description: Projects that included Laravel Backend, Node.JS Webscraping with puppeteer and selenium and React Front-end. Exemple: Portal do Turismo, available at projects section.

freela.description: Numerous websites created for small marketing companies at Natal, creation with Wordpress custom Themes.
